attributes.action: csa to take giving partner outgoings into account
attributes.additional_details:
The paying parent should have all outgoings into account within the csa calculator ie rent, debts, council tax, gas, electric, water food. How can csa make people homeless by saying they are more important than bills? Child benefit is £80.20 per month per child so why should paying parents pay £500-£600 a month??

Surely government says a person should live on £70 a week CSA payments leave paying parents with less than that.

The receiving parents (mostly unemployed ) rent and bills paid for by the government why should they get extra living on more than a working paying parent.

Please sign and make these changes - many paying parents are close to sucide with such payments being too high?
